page.title: 14Trade_Post Office
page.content: Muston Post Office is in Bridlington St.Mr.Brown has run the Post Office since 1980.He bought the Post Office shop because he liked the village and it's enviroment.Mr.Brown enjoys his job because he is dealing with people. {Customers.}About 30 people visit his shop each day.Thursday is Mr. Brown's busiest day.He can get about 10 people in his shop at once.Mr.Brown sells Groceries,Fruits,Drinks,Butter,Meat,Sp irits,and most everyday goods. {Post Office.}The Post Office has a number of different services such as National Savings,Giro Bank,Pension allowances,payments and stamps.Nobody works in the shop apart from Mr.Brown and his Wife. {Opening Hours.}Mr.Brown opens every day except Tuesday afternoon and Sunday afternoon.Mr.Brown opens at 9:00 a.m. and clolses at 5:30 p.m.
